message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed your expectations. This exceptional item holds significant value to us at $1,200,000, reflecting its quality, uniqueness, and the effort put into its creation. Given its immense worth to you, valued at $1,000,000, I propose we bridge the gap with a mutually beneficial offer. Would you consider purchasing this remarkable product at a price of $1,100,000? This offer allows you to acquire an item that is not only a testament to its creators' dedication but also aligns closely with your perceived value. I look forward to your positive response.
